subject: Re: [junit] Whether I must extends TestCase?
msgSnippet: If I can extends my product class. I can get lots of things from my superclass. I just want to make a simple test case, so I want to do that so. ...
messageBody:
If I can extends my product class. I can get lots of
things from my superclass.
I just want to make a simple test case, so I want to
do that so.

--- "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@...> 的正文：
---------------------------------
�ffffd2�fffffc�ffffce�ffffb0�ffffc3�fffffa
wrote:

> I want to test a package. If I extends my own
class,
> it will save me lots of time. :)

This is interesting. I have never wanted my test class
to extend a
production code class. More strongly, test code should
be a client of
production code, and not the other way around. Why
would this save you time?

J. B. Rainsberger,
